results.idea: Short-term momentum: cross-sectional z-score of 5-day z-score of daily change
results.description: Used mcr38_change (high coverage 0.9795, userCount=344, alphaCount=1257) as main input. SUGGESTION1: used one strong field (chose quality over many fields). SUGGESTION2: no vector field present. SUGGESTION3: coverage >0.6 so no ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: high user/alpha counts informed selection. Kept implementation within KEEP_IN_MIND limits (<=2 fields, <=7 operators). Confidence set to 0.72 based on typical momentum persistence.

results.idea: 5-day return momentum (cross-sectional z-score of ts_returns)
results.description: Used mcr38_last for returns (coverage 0.9796, userCount=238, alphaCount=1943). SUGGESTION1: single high-quality price field. SUGGESTION2: no vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill needed. SUGGESTION4: high alphaCount favored mcr38_last. Adhered to KEEP_IN_MIND on operators/datafields. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Volume-confirmed momentum: multiply price zscore and volume zscore
results.description: Combined mcr38_change and mcr38_volume to add volume confirmation (SUGGESTION1 applied). Both have high coverage and good user/alpha counts. No vector fields present (SUGGESTION2). Coverage high so no ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Implementation respects operator/datafield limits. Confidence 0.70 because volume confirmation often improves signal.

results.idea: Short-term mean reversion: negative z-score of 3-day percent change
results.description: Used mcr38_percent_change (coverage 0.9796). SUGGESTION1: single field chosen for clarity. SUGGESTION2: no vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage fine. SUGGESTION4: moderate user/alpha counts. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.62 reflecting mean-reversion variability.

results.idea: Strength-weighted direction: multiply direction rating with overall percent
results.description: Used mcr38_direction_rating and mcr38_overall_percent (two fields, SUGGESTION1). Both have high coverage and reasonable user/alpha counts. No vector usage. No backfill needed. Implementation short and within limits. Confidence 0.66 as blend of directional and strength signals.

results.idea: Long-term trend filter: zscore of longterm percent smoothed by 20-day mean
results.description: Used mcr38_longterm_percent (coverage 0.959). SUGGESTION1: single field since it's an aggregate long-term indicator. SUGGESTION3: coverage ok. SUGGESTION4: moderate counts. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence 0.64 for long-term signal stability.

results.idea: MA crossover strength: use MA_20 vs MA_50 strength difference
results.description: Used mcr38_ma_20_strength and mcr38_ma_50_strength (SUGGESTION1). Both coverages high and userCounts reasonable. No vector or backfill needed. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.67 as moving-average crossovers are robust.

results.idea: MACD momentum: zscore of MACD 20/50 strength smoothed
results.description: Used mcr38_macd_20_50_strength (coverage 0.9596). SUGGESTION1: single strong signal used. SUGGESTION3: sufficient coverage. SUGGESTION4: moderate counts. Implementation respects limits. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Bollinger confirmation: bb_strength multiplied by short-term change
results.description: Combined mcr38_bb_strength and mcr38_change (SUGGESTION1 to merge indicator strength and price move). Both have high coverage and good counts. No ts_backfill or vectors. Implementation short. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Composite signal average: average of short, medium, long term percents
results.description: Used mcr38_shorttermpercent and mcr38_longterm_percent (two fields only to respect KEEP_IN_MIND2; SUGGESTION1 partially applied). Coverage good; no vector/backfill needed. Simplicity maintained. Confidence 0.63 recognizing mixed horizons.

results.idea: Direction-change divergence: ts_delta of direction rating
results.description: Used mcr38_direction_rating (high coverage). SUGGESTION1: single field chosen to capture directional momentum. No vectors/backfill. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence 0.6 due to discrete rating noise.

results.idea: Strength-adjusted returns: multiply 5-day return zscore by strength rating
results.description: Combined mcr38_strength_rating and mcr38_last-derived returns (SUGGESTION1). Used ts_returns on mcr38_last for returns; both fields have high coverage and user/alpha counts. No vector/backfill. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Volatility breakout: zscore of 10-day stddev of returns (mean-reversion filter)
results.description: Used mcr38_last to compute ts_std_dev(ts_returns(...),10). SUGGESTION1: single high-quality price field. No vector/backfill. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.58 as volatility signals are mixed.

results.idea: Momentum persistence: ts_ir (information ratio) of 20-day returns
results.description: Used mcr38_last (price) to compute ts_ir(ts_returns(...),20). SUGGESTION1: single datafield. SUGGESTION3 not needed. KEEP_IN_MIND met. Confidence 0.66 for persistence in IR.

results.idea: Price-volume divergence: difference between price zscore and volume zscore
results.description: Used mcr38_change and mcr38_volume (SUGGESTION1) to detect divergence. Both high coverage and counts. No vectors/backfill. Implementation within operator limits. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: BB breakout momentum: ts_max_diff of price normalized by bb_strength
results.description: Used mcr38_last and mcr38_bb_strength (two fields). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high, no backfill. Kept ops under limit. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Consensus signal: normalize overall_percent to get cross-sectional bets
results.description: Used mcr38_overall_percent (single aggregated field). SUGGESTION1: chosen aggregated single field to reduce noise. SUGGESTION4: acceptable counts. No vector/backfill. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Short-term z-score momentum with winsorization
results.description: Used mcr38_percent_change (high coverage). Applied winsorize to reduce outliers (operator limit respected). SUGGESTION1 single field used; SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: MA strength divergence: subtract MA100 strength from MA20 strength
results.description: Used mcr38_ma_20_strength and mcr38_ma_100_strength (SUGGESTION1). Both high coverage. No vector/backfill. Simple subtraction within KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Trendspotter confirmation: zscore of trendspotter strength times recent return
results.description: Combined mcr38_trendspotter_strength and mcr38_change (SUGGESTION1). Both have good coverage. No vector/backfill. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Momentum times confidence: multiply percent change zscore by strength rating

results.idea: Mean-revert extreme movers: negative ts_arg_max of 7-day change
results.description: Used mcr38_change (single field). SUGGESTION1: single high-quality field chosen. No vector/backfill. Operator count small. Confidence 0.59 since argmax mean reversion can be noisy.

results.idea: Volume surge filter: only trade when volume zscore > threshold (trade_when)
results.description: Used mcr38_volume and mcr38_change (SUGGESTION1) to create conditional trades. No vectors/backfill. Applied trade_when to reduce trades; kept simple. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Compound momentum: multiply 3-day and 10-day change zscores
